message: Let's start with a fair split. I think this is a good place to begin, but I'm open to your thoughts.
I appreciate your fairness in the first round, Alice.  I think a 55/45 split is a bit more favorable to me, but still leaves a good share for you. Let's see what you think!
I think a 52.5/47.5 split is a fair compromise.  This gives us both a good share of the remaining value.  Let's end it here and avoid further inflation.
